description: üèóÔ∏è TrashQuest connects communities to clean up public spaces and protect nature. It is a work in progress, please find the project description in our github repository and contact heleneruelle@hotmail.com if you want to join !

generic.title: Something Went Wrong
generic.description: Our team is already working on fixing the issue, and we appreciate your patience. Please try again later.

welcome.title: Join TrashQuest and take action for the planet!
welcome.description: Create or join cleanup quests to clear parks, streets, and rivers of waste. Track your progress, level up, and be part of a citizen-led environmental movement. Together, let‚Äôs transform our public spaces!

home.title: Discover quests near you
home.description: Find upcoming cleanup events in your neighborhood, parks, or rivers.

create.title: Create your own quests with customizable parameters to set your goals
create.description: Launch cleanup events based on your criteria and ecological objectives.

join.title: Discover quests to join
join.description: Find nearby cleanup events and contribute to protecting your environment.

manage.title: Manage your quests as both an organizer and a participant
manage.description: Track your events, invite participants, and actively help transform public spaces.

login.title: Please login to your account
login.error: Oops! There seems to be a problem with your credentials. We're working on resolving it. Please try again soon.

temp.description: Trashquest being a work in progress, if you have landed on this link you will discover an app in its early development stage. If you don't feel comfortable creating your own account, you can use one of those 2 test accounts :

create-new-account.title: Create your Trashquest account
create-new-account.description: Your mission to clean up the world starts here!

hint.username: Your username will be your profile name and visible in events and quests.
hint.location: Your location helps us recommend quests nearby.

create-new-quest.title: Create a new quest

input.name: Quest name
input.start: Choose quest start date and time
input.end: Choose quest end date and time
input.banner: Choose a banner image (png or jpeg)

hint.name: Try to provide a short but very descriptive title to help other users undertsand your quest.
hint.location: Add a location or address. Be as specific as possible, it will make it easier for your guests to find you.
hint.description: Provide a short description to give more context on your quest. max 3000 char.
hint.equipment: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests if they should bring equipment of their own. Otherwise they will assume you will provide everything for the quest.
hint.environment: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests what kind of place they should expect to find themselves in.
hint.accessibility: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests if the quest location is accessible for them.

create-new-quest.error: Oops! There seems to be a problem with the creation of a new quest. We're in the process of resolving it. Please try again soon.

error.title: Sorry there seem to be a problem, the quest you are looking for no longer exists.
error.join: Sorry, it seems your request to join this quest has failed.

quest.joined: Congratulations! You're registered for this quest !

dateTime.start: This quest starts on {{date}} at {{time, HH:mm}}
dateTime.end: This quest ends on {{date}} at {{time, HH:mm}}

summary.unkown-accessibility: No accessibility information has been provided by the quest creator.

going.title: Your quests as a participant
going.none: You have no current quest as a participant.

past.title: Your past quests
past.none: You have no archived quests as an organizer or participant.

quests.no-quest: There is no quest for you to join. Create your own and start gathering a team for your adventure !
quests.no-quest-filters: There is no quest matching your filters. Please try to adapt them to see what's going on !

me.title: About me
me.content:
As a child, I had a strange habit: picking up things off the ground in the street, much to my parents' dismay. While this hobby sometimes led to a few misadventures, it instilled in me a passion for rescuing furniture, clothes, or objects, either to give them a second life or, at times, to throw them away or place them in recycling bins. I‚Äôm not disturbed by what is on the ground, and I particularly enjoy walking through public spaces that are not marred by the remnants of our consumption, which inevitably pollute both human and non-human life.

The idea of creating Trashquest came from this personal experience and from observing the cleanups organized by various associations, especially on beaches that are often covered in plastic washed up by the tide or left behind by swimmers. I wanted to create a platform that helps individuals, institutions, and associations organize cleanups and recruit participants. These quests are also an opportunity to explore both urban and non-urban areas. I truly believe that ecology should be practiced on all scales, and that every environment deserves protection. Trashquest invites everyone to join an adventure, in the style of role-playing games, to eliminate waste pollution.

I hope this tool can inspire others to organize their own cleanups while creating spaces for connection. The growing number of quests could also leave a trace of the pollution avoided and raise awareness among the wider public about the protection of public spaces and our shared responsibility in managing our waste.

my-profile.no-quest: You are not currently organizing any quests.

profile.no-quest: {{username}} is not currently organizing any quests.
